text: hi guys today I'm going to show you how
to buy the best fish and the best fish
of course is fresh and of the highest
quality but at the same time we need to
take care
many of our oceans are overfished so
therefore if you buy a piece of fish
make sure it has been caught in a
sustainable in a responsible way and if
you buy a piece of wild card fish look
for the certificate of the Marine
Stewardship Council which you can
recognize on a dis label for prepaid
fish it's easy to recognize and fresh on
frozen or on tin so if you visit your
fishmonger store make sure it's a
sustainable store you can buy fish
fillets over there
the data is to buy a whole piece of fish
why you can recognize the freshness and
it's no waste so if you want to buy
fresh fish make sure the eyes are bright
the gills are red and the skin is shiny
and you can sniff the fish because fresh
fish doesn't smell good luck and enjoy
and if you want to see more tips click
on the link
